ai-patthana22.23:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.23:3.1_0: (They are) not able to give a teaching for the sake of having no cause or condition.
ai-patthana22.23:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana22.23:4.1_0: the result of nine prominent speech ...
ai-patthana22.23:5.1_0: or path does not have a reason for listening to the teaching, there is a cause for the sake of the path,
ai-patthana22.23:5.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana22.23:6.1_0: ‘... for the sake of all six years.’ ...
ai-patthana22.23:7.1_1: not the cause, condition, or condition.
ai-patthana22.23:7.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana22.23:8.1_0: And for the sake of three kinds of objects, three, three, four, five, six, ten, twenty, thirty, forty, fifty, a hundred, a thousand, or a hundred thousand faculties (presents). There are, three faculties, and three with non-human beings).
